name: Kingdom Tales 2
description: Help young Finn and princess Dahla reunite in love!
minimum_requirements: OS: WinXP, Vista, 7,8 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 320 MB available space

reviews.review_text: It's exactly like the first one, which I found nice. That's what I was hoping for. Simple resource management game with a light plot.
